main event: On April 6, 1964, Mr. and Mrs. James S. Musselmann reported observing a glowing round or oval object in the sky near Canyon Ferry, Montana.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing yellow-white and was at an altitude of about 2,000 feet.,The Musselmanns observed the object for approximately 2 to 3 minutes before it disappeared behind trees.,Two airmen also witnessed two round luminous objects hovering over a frozen lake on April 12, 1964.,The airmen noted the objects were approximately 3-4 feet in diameter and appeared to be 30 feet above the ground.,The documented sightings were part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book program investigating UFO reports.
sighted object: a round or oval luminous object in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. James S. Musselmann and two airmen
